institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 7 (Return of Subsidy)
contents: Article 7 (Return of subsidy) ① If the person in charge of account deposit has paid the subsidy incorrectly, he/she must immediately take recovery action by issuing a GIRO invoice stating the affiliated organization number, name of the person who received the subsidy in error, amount, type of subsidy, etc. do. ② If there is any support fund that has not been recovered by the end of the relevant year, the head of the affiliated organization shall notify the local employment and labor office in charge of the details of non-recovery in writing and take recovery measures.
